intro.paragraph1: To join Nostr you need a profile, but it is not the usual one that a company generates and manages for you. You create it yourself, no permissions are required.
intro.paragraph2: Nostr is a different experience from the beginning: because there is no central authority taking care of who is who, each user is identified by a cryptographic keypair; don't worry about the tech slang, it is just a strong password that you will have to keep safe.
intro.paragraph3: This wizard is one of the many ways to bootstrap a Nostr profile that you can later use in other apps. We help you to create your keypair and safely manage it in a few steps. Are you ready?
intro.paragraph3_with_app: This wizard is used by {appName} to let you create your new profile and safely manage it, in a few steps.

meta.title: Create your Nostr account
meta.description: Create your Nostr account, back it up, and get a Nostr Connect bunker URL in few easy steps!

on_nostr: On Nostr you are identified by a cryptographic keypair, which is just a strong password that you will have to keep safe.

intro.decide: On Nostr you decide to be whoever you want.
intro.profile_info: A Nostr profile usually includes a name, a picture and some additional information, but it's all optional.
intro.name_explanation: The name is not a unique username, we can have as many Jacks we want! Feel free to use your real name or a nickname; you can always change it later.
intro.privacy_note: But remember: online privacy matters, don't share sensitive data.
intro.kyc_free: And yes, to join Nostr you don't need to give your email address, phone number or anything like that, it is KYC free.

form.alert: Please enter a name, bio and website are optional

intro.paragraph2: This is only a quick selection of the 80+ applications that have already been built on Nostr,

qr_code.scan: Scan the QR code for quick login from mobile!

intro.well_done: Well done {name}, your Nostr profile is ready! Yes, it was that easy.
intro.public_key: On Nostr your keypair is identified by a unique string that starts with npub. This is your public profile code that you can share with anyone.
intro.private_key: Then there's the private key. It starts with nsec and is used to control your profile and publish notes. This must be kept absolutely secret.
intro.download: Now, please download your nsec (it's a text file) and save it in a safe place, for example in your password manager.

interactive.nsec_explanation: From your nsec you can generate your npub, so it is the only information you really need to keep safe.

intro.suggestion: What do you think now of following some interesting profiles? We offer you the possibility to copy the full following list of some Nostr users, so you can start your Nostr journey with a feed full of posts from already curated individuals.
intro.control: You can later follow more people, or unfollow some as well; with Nostr you control what you want to see, no obscure and deceptive algorithms, no impositions.

interactive.feed_intro: See the same things these Nostr users are seeing in their feed:

intro.offer: We offer you the possibility to send your encrypted nsec (so actually a ncryptsec) to your email address to have another convenient backup location.
intro.password_new: Just pick a strong password and keep it safe, write it down now, make sure you don't lose it.
intro.password_existing: We will use the same password you picked up previously. You wrote it down, right? :)

intro.split_nsec: Now you have the possibility to split your nsec in 3 using a technique called
intro.frost_explanation: and distribute each shard to an independent trusted remote signer.
intro.bunker_code: This will give you a bunker code that you can use to login in many web, mobile and desktop apps without exposing your nsec.
intro.recovery: If you ever lose your bunker code, if the signers vanish from Earth and it stops working or if it gets stolen by a malware virus you can use your nsec to create a new and invalidate the old one.
